Everything Bagel Seared Tuna Bowl


Ingredients
1 tablespoon red onion
1 tablespoon jalapeno pepper
1 tablespoon low-sodium soy sauce
1 tablespoon chopped cilantro
1 lime, juiced
1/4 teaspoon minced garlic
1 ( 6 ounce tuna steak
1 tablespoon everything bagel seasoning
1 tablespoon sesame oil
1 cup cooked white rice
1 avocado
1/2 cup English cucumber

Cooking Instructions

Stir together red onions, jalapeno pepper, soy sauce,
cilantro, lime juice, and minced garlic in a small bowl.
Coat tuna steaks evenly with everything bagel seasoning.
Heat sesame oil in a cast iron skillet over high heat until
very hot. Place tuna steak in the pan; sear for about 30
seconds on each side. Cut tuna into slices. Place cooked
rice in a bowl and top it with seared tuna, sliced avocado,
and chopped cucumber. Pour over sauce and serve.
